name: Teddy Bear
description: Snuggle up with childhood nostalgia! This warm vanilla-honey blend wrapped in cashmere undertones will cradle you in comforting familiarity.

name: Dancing Lady
description: Elegance in motion! A sophisticated fusion of night-blooming jasmine and bergamot that pirouettes through your senses like silk.

name: Squirrel Hug
description: Nature's embrace captured in wax! Earthy oakmoss meets playful apple blossoms, perfect for cozying up with a good book.

name: Bear & Maugli
description: Wild adventure awaits! Jungle-grown cardamom and wild fig create an exotic duet of spice and sweetness.

name: Royal Vanilla
description: Regal indulgence fit for queens! Madagascar vanilla bean infused with golden amber - a crown jewel of fragrances.

name: Red Secret
description: Seduction in every flicker! Black currant and smoked patchouli whisper mysteries only firelight can reveal.

name: Baby Fox
description: Playful innocence perfected! A fuzzy blend of peach nectar and whipped cream that'll steal your heart.

name: King Aslan
description: Roar with confidence! Majestic sandalwood and lion's mane mushroom extract command respect in every room.

name: Caramel Geometry
description: Modern decadence defined! Precise angles of burnt caramel balance perfectly with round vanilla orchid notes.

name: Blooming Flower
description: Spring eternal! A bouquet of peony, gardenia, and dewy grass bursting with fresh optimism.

name: Victorias Hand
description: Victorian elegance reimagined! Delicate lace of rose absolute interwoven with herbal lavender sophistication.

name: Wood & Fire
description: Crackling cabin charm! Smoked teak and ember-kissed cedar create your personal hearthside retreat.

name: Scarlet Gold
description: Luxury incarnate! Ripe pomegranate dipped in liquid saffron and amber - Midas' touch for your home.

name: Japanese Garden
description: Zen in every breath! Green tea serenity meets Zen garden minerals and whispering bamboo.

name: Romeos Love
description: Eternal romance bottled! Passionate red roses mingling with lovestruck strawberry kisses.

name: White Rose
description: Pure sophistication! Alabaster petals of creamy gardenia floating in champagne effervescence.

name: Magical Night
description: Enchantment under moonlight! Midnight violet dusted with starlit vanilla and a wisp of dragon's blood.

name: Lavender Dreams
description: Sleep's sweet lullaby! French lavender fields kissed by moonlit vanilla and stress-melting chamomile.

name: Spartan Queen
description: Fierce femininity unleashed! Leather-bound history books meet triumphant orange blossom conquests.

name: Cinnamon & Apple
description: Autumn's warm hug! Fresh-picked apples dancing with spicy cinnamon sticks by the fireside.
